page.title: 11POTTEN END-THE GREEN I.
page.content:
THE CENTRE OF THE VILLAGE GREEN IS WHERE THE VILLAGE HALL IS NORMALLY FOUND. SUCH IS THE CASE IN POTTEN END WHERE THE PRESENT VILLAGE HALL WAS BUILT IN 1927. NEXT TO THE HALL IS THE HOLY TRINITY CHURCH WHICH COMBINE THEIR EFFORTS TO MAINTAIN THE VILLAGE COMMUNITIES WAY OF LIFE,WHICH BECOMES MORE DIFFICULT AS THE AREA DEVELOPS.
EACH YEAR AT EASTER A TRAVELLING FAIR MEETS TO ENTERTAIN THE COMMUNITY,THIS FAIR HAS GOT ALL THE SAME RIDES AND ATMOSPHERE AS ANY OTHER FAIR,BUT I WOULDN'T THINK THAT IT IS QUITE AS BIG AS OTHER FAIRS BECAUSE THERE IS SO LITTLE SPACE FOR THE FAIR TO SET UP IN. THIS HAS BEEN THE CASE FOR AS LONG AS ANYBODY IN THE AREA CAN REMEMBER.
